name: dirdock
title: DirDock
description: Add your most commonly used directories to one place and quickly reopen them.
author: bao_yuxiang

commands.name: open-dirdock
commands.title: Open DirDock
commands.subtitle: DirDock
commands.description: find out your added directories in DirDock

commands.name: add-directory
commands.title: Add Directory
commands.subtitle: DirDock
commands.description: Add a new directory to your DirDock

commands.name: remove-directory
commands.title: Remove Directory
commands.subtitle: DirDock
commands.description: Remove specific or all directories from DirDock

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
